#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <map>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	vector<string> A( 50 );
	int t, n, v, sum, i;
	int dot[ 10 ] = {0,1,2,3,4,5,4,3,2,1};

	A[ 0 ] = "-----";
	A[ 1 ] = ".----";
	A[ 2 ] = "..---";
	A[ 3 ] = "...--";
	A[ 4 ] = "....-";
	A[ 5 ] = ".....";
	A[ 6 ] = "-....";
	A[ 7 ] = "--...";
	A[ 8 ] = "---..";
	A[ 9 ] = "----.";

	scanf("%d\n", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		string s, str = "";

		cin >> s;
		n = s.length();
		sum = 0;

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			v = s[ i ] - '0';

			sum += dot[ v ];
			str += A[ v ];	

		}

		cout << str << endl;
		cout << sum << endl;

	}

	return 0;
}
